title: Associating one Google Calendar with multiple Thunderbird accounts
content:
I'm currently using eM Client your email because it has one critical for me feature. it can make a single Google Calendar its primary calendar.

I have two accounts, one on Google (primarily for calendar and drive), and the actual business account which is privately hosted. Â I want the home / primary calendar of the privately hosted account to be the Google Calendar of the Google account period in other words, when I get invites on either account I want the invite added to the Google Calendar.

I also have two other pairs of Google Google account and non Google account I want to treat the same way.
creator: ynotlayabout

title: One Year Calendar View
content:
Hi,

I have clients that are asking that a one year calendar view be added to the calendar. Right now we have Day, Week, Month views. If the Year could be added like Google has then they would be happy.

Thanks for doing such a good job. Bob
creator: bob341

title: Pictures in email
content: Since the last update, I have NOT been able to add a picture to the body of the text in an email. I have to send all pictures as an attachment which is quit annoying and time consuming. It will not accept a pnp format either. If I forward something with pictures, they too will not go through. What is the problem???????
creator: Mac73

title: Remove history
content: I accidentally transposed two letters in an email address I sent. Now, every time I want to write to that address, both the correct and incorrect choices show up in the address bar. How can I get rid of the incorrect one?
creator: DorothyJ

title: Thunderbird Truncating Messages
content:
Since I installed version 115.0.1 messages with the same subject line or Re: to the same subject line are being stacked on top of one another with only an arrow telling me there is something hidden there. This causes me to miss messages for hours or perhaps days. Is there any way to stop this?

Thanks, Clyde
creator: Creid

title: Folder Modes are static (no refreshing or possible after hours?)
content:
I make extensive use of the so-called 'Folder Modes' in (currently) Thunderbird 115.1.0 (64-bit), especially the 'Unread Folders' setting.

Unfortunately, a newly Unread Folder (a folder that receives new email) will happily pop into view, but a folder that has only read articles in it (or is empty) stays in view, and seemingly forever.

Is there a way to scan folders (settable, as a toggle (e.g. an F key) or with a default (reasonable) interval) to refresh the view to once more contain only Unread Folders (or whatever the Folder Mode is set to)?

This would make this setting much more usable. I really don't mind hitting a Function key for this, but a built-in refresh/rescan would be better, of course.
creator: firefox2420

title: Thunderbird 115 "delete current row"
content: I recently upgraded to Thunderbird 115 and ever since I am having problems with the "Delete Current Row" button (DCR). The DCR button doesn't work when I first open Thunderbird until I have deleted a row using the delete key on my keyboard. Then the DCR button will work. What can I do to fix this? I thought about rolling back to version TB102 but I can't do that due to change profile file. So I will stick with TB115 but would like the DCR button to work every time.
creator: dnmark.burley

title: delete suggested email address when drafting new email
content: Thunderbird "suggests" email address when drafting a new email. Some of those are incorrect, others irrelevant. Is there a way to delete all of those?
creator: DrDively

title: Missing E-mail
content: I did a recent update of Thunderbird and it wiped one of my e-mails completely clean. When I closed and opened the e-mail, the mail was there but then everything disappeared. I do not have a back up. Where did my mail disappear to and can you retrieve it somehow because it didn't occur until I did the Thunderbird update? None of my other e-mails within Thunderbird were touched. My folders remain, but my e-mail is completely gone.
creator: kimitra

title: Using multiple SMTP servers in Thunderbird
content:
I have two different mail accounts which I use within one Thunderbird environment on my Windows 10 computer. However, I am finding more and more that emails go to the recipient's spam folder (or are rejected) because the domain of the SMTP server does not match that of the mail (on one of the two accounts). I don't want to keep changing the SMTP server depending on which mail account I send from.

I don't want to use a different program per mail account, and I don't want to just use one account as I segregate between mails to people I know well and more general mail, also to keep spam in one account.

Is there any way to solve this?
creator: Mark-E-H

title: Stampa su piu pagine di una mail che normalmente viene stampata su una pagina-Versione Beta 117.0b1 (64 bit)
content:
Sto utilizzando la versione beta 117.0b1 (64 bit). La stampa di alcune mail (non tutte) che normalmente viene stampata su una pagina, in questa versione viene suddivisa cosi: La prima parte dove viene indicato il mittente viene stampato su una prima pagina, una parte del corpo della mail viene stampata su un'altra pagina e un'altra parte ancora del corpo della mail e la parte finale viene stampata su un'altra pagina (sulla versione normale il tutto rimane su una pagina). Ho controllato tutti i valori in editor di configurazione e sono esattamente uguali a quelli della versione funzionante (102.14.0 (32 bit). Non riesco a trovare la causa di un comportamento diverso in fase di stampa (vale anche su stampa in PDF, etc). Grazie, saluti

P.S. Preciso che sono dovuto passare alla versione Beta perche in fase di Ricezione di alcune PEC inoltratemi, gli allegati non venivano allegati alla mail ricevuta. Nella versione Beta questo problema Ã¨ stato risolto ma e' sorto il problema della stampa anomala di alcune mail su piu pagine mentre normalmente vengono stampate su una pagina. Grazie
creator: vittorio.dellagli

title: Thunderbird 115 freezes at start
content:
Hi Community, i wanted to ask wether it normal that Thunderbird 115 needs 60 seconds to load the interface? When it starts it shows my personalised theme and an empty space for a whole minute. (i measured it)

Directly after installation everything was fine. But now i have set up my acconts and rearranged some buttons. Is there maybe a problem with Exchange synchronisation on startup? Both of my accounts are provided by Exchange servers.

Greetings ffproblems
creator: ffproblems

title: Digital Signatures are maked as not valid in TB 115.1.0 (64-bit) Windows
content: In TB 115.1.0 (64-bit) on Windows digital signature are maked as not valid for an unknown reason. This happens at least with emails send from Outlook clients. In TB 102.14.0 (64-bit) on Windows this digital signatures were shown as valid. However, digitsal signatures of emails send from other clients (e.g. Thunderbird, Nine from 9folders) are shown as valid.
creator: Daniel_dM

title: Meeting invite showing the time of sender when accepted.
content: MY time zone is Europe/Prague set in TB 102 and Windows 10. When I receive the meeting invite, it shows correct time in our zime zone. When I accept the invite , metting time changes to the time of an invite sender. I can see our correct time croswed out in an invite and replaced by a senderÂ´s time. Strange think it happens only to the (reoccuring) invite from US , from Japan it works fine.
creator: jkrnavek

title: Newest Version of Thunderbird
content:
As of the newest TB version out July 31, 2023, I cannot send outgoing emails. Never had this problem with TB. After years of happily using TB and loving its wonderful functions and features, this inability to send outgoing emails is a mystery. Tried just about everything, but can find no fix. Tried to find a Mozilla-authorized earlier version to replace the newest version but could not find one on a Mozilla-authorized site to download.

Worked with 7 computer techs from the company from which I bought my new Win 11 computer this year--they couldn't find a fix. Worked with 5 techs from my Internet provider but not one of them could fix the outgoing email problem. Uninstalled, re-installed, repeated, checked all settings, stopped security software--nothing fixes the problem. My Spectrum webmail still brings in my incoming and sends out my outgoing emails but TB does not send the outgoing. I can only conclude the problem is the newest version of TB. Am I right? Is a fix on the way?

Who has run into this problem and how have you fixed it? Already spent 2 1/2 days working on this and not even the "computer experts" have a clue. Any TB heroes out there who can come to the rescue? Or should I wait a few weeks until this glitch in the newest version is fixed? Thanks in advance. I'm lost without my wonderful TB!
creator: marywithaquestion

title: New Thunderbird version downloaded by Telstra. How can I retrieve lost Address Books and second email address?
content: Connection to Thunderbird 'app failed because its side by side configuration is incorrect.' Told to 'See the application event log or use the command-line sxtrac.exe tool' for more information. Contacted Telstra.com.au who checked and downloaded latest Thunderbird version. I have lost all Address Books and my second email dw715937@gmail.com installed on my PC. Telstra advised my PC had been corrupted. Can you please help me retrieve the lost info? Many thanks, David Wilson
creator: terjesen

title: Showing number of emails in a folder
content:
A few days ago, I reset my Win 10 computer. I then had to reinstall Tbird. I had saved the Profile so that saved email, addresses, etc were quickly reinstalled. One feature that I like was the display of the number of emails saved in each folder. That didnât return. The only number that appears is the number of unread emails in the Inbox.

I found a user who had the same problem 3 years ago. (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1297303)

A solution was given: âView/Layout/Folder Pane Columns, then right-click any column button and select Total, Size, Unreadâ

Unfortunately, my version of Tbird (155.1.0) only shows View/Layout/Folder Pane â the word columns is absent. Any suggestion to cause the folder content numbers to appear following the names of the folders? Thanks.
creator: I_Rufus
